channel.title: Need a tut on special ring read here what i mean
channel.description: Can any1 help me with this every1 knows p ring right? i want a ring a (onyxring) when u put him on uget 1000 bonus everything and it makes u invisible when wielded when u put off u will be visible again? Can any1 give a tut about that i would appreciate it ty anyway :cool:

item.title: Need a tut on special ring read here what i mean
item.dc:creator: @z4mor4k_m1n1on z4mor4k m1n1on
item.description:
@z4mor4k_m1n1on wrote:

i can do the 1000 bonuses, but the invisible i dunno[br][size=1]Posted on: December 24, 2006, 06:57:43 PM[/size][hr]i cant find onyx ring on my items.cfg so search for Seers_Ring and replace it with this item = 6731 Seers_Ring A_mysterious_ring_that_can_fill_the_wearer_with_magical_power. 6000 6000 8000 1000 1000 1000 1000 1000 1000 1000 1000 1000 1000 1000 1000

Read full topic
